title: Heartbreaking Video Shows Swan Removing Plastic Waste From Water Body So Her Babies Don't Choke
text:
We recently shared a video of a monkey using leaves to prevent a pipe from leaking. There's even a video of a crow throwing garbage in a dustbin, and another one shows a primate closing a tap after drinking water from it. All these instances show that a lot of animals are more well behaved than a lot of humans, most of whom have still not understood the importance of conserving water and not littering plastic.

Now, a video of a swan picking out plastic from a choked water body is going viral, after Yuvraj Singh shared it. The video was originally shared by IFS Parveen Kaswan in June with the caption, ‘A #swan cleaning #plastic waste spread by us for her family. Since they also have to survive. An example how our #pollution is chocking others lifeline. Eye opener’.

Heartbreaking to see them suffer this way. Plastic is choking our planet, we need to find ways to eliminate it. Let’s learn from these innocent birds and be a part of the Solution not part of the pollution. #StopOceanPlasticPollution #ClimateChangeIsReal pic.twitter.com/RMDjqQPL6t — yuvraj singh (@YUVSTRONG12) October 12, 2019

Yuvraj Singh, on the other hand, captioned the video, ‘Heartbreaking to see them suffer this way. Plastic is choking our planet, we need to find ways to eliminate it. Let’s learn from these innocent birds and be a part of the Solution not part of the pollution. #StopOceanPlasticPollution #ClimateChangeIsReal’.

The swan and her babies seem to be around a toxic water body, hinted by the foam in the video. The mother swan seems diligent in her will to remove the plastic from her surroundings, so that her babies do not choke on it.
